experiences.description: Design, develop, and deploy enterprise-grade web and in-house applications using C# and VB.NET to support large-scale media monitoring and intelligence systems. Architect and build Angular web applications in a monorepo setup for searching, filtering, and processing high volumes of online content. Develop and maintain data processing pipelines that ingest, normalize, and match internet content to client-specific requirements. Build Python-based data ingestion and scraping solutions using AWS services for scalable and reliable processing.

experiences.position: Global IT Digital Application Support Sr. Analyst
experiences.description: Design, develop and deploy a Solution using C#/ReactJS used in Tire industry using Azure Technologies (App Service, Azure Sql). Sharepoint technology with Javascript components
Design, develop and deploy an ERP Solution using Proprietary language combined with .NET frameworks using C# and VB programming language with SQL Database.

Design, develop and deploy a Content acquisition Web application using PHP (Laravel Framework) with MySQL/PostgreSQL. Design, develop and deploy a Console application written in C#.net to automate content acquisition process. Design, develop and deploy a web scraping tools using Python (Scrappy framework).
Design and develop technical solutions for a Healthcare web application using C#.net with SQL Database.
